statements: SELECT * FROM legal_documents ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT document_type, document_content FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Contract'
SELECT document_id, created_at FROM legal_documents WHERE updated_at IS NULL
SELECT * FROM legal_documents ORDER BY document_type ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT document_type, document_content, updated_at FROM legal_documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Contract' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT document_type, count(*) FROM legal_documents GROUP BY document_type HAVING count(*) > 5 ORDER BY count(*) DESC
SELECT document_id, document_type, created_at FROM legal_documents WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type IN ('Agreement', 'NDA') AND document_content LIKE '%confidential%' ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT DISTINCT document_type FROM legal_documents ORDER BY document_type
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, party1_name, party2_name FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, party1_name, party2_name FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_contracts FROM contracts;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE party1_name = 'Alice' AND party2_name = 'Bob';
SELECT contract_name, contract_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT party1_name, party2_name, COUNT(contract_id) AS num_contracts FROM contracts GROUP BY party1_name, party2_name ORDER BY num_contracts DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_date FROM contracts UNION ALL SELECT agreement_name, agreement_date FROM agreements ORDER BY contract_date ASC, agreement_date ASC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_body FROM contracts WHERE contract_body LIKE '%confidential%' OR contract_body LIKE '%secret%' ORDER BY contract_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT title, created_at FROM contracts ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT party_id, contract_id, signed_on FROM signatures WHERE party_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM parties WHERE address LIKE '%Lane%';
SELECT id, title, content FROM contracts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM contracts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.id, c.title, p.name FROM contracts c JOIN parties p ON c.id = p.id;
SELECT c.title, s.signed_on FROM contracts c JOIN signatures s ON c.id = s.contract_id;
SELECT c.title, s.signed_on, p.name FROM contracts c JOIN signatures s ON c.id = s.contract_id JOIN parties p ON s.party_id = p.id;
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_text, signing_date FROM contracts WHERE client_id = 101;
SELECT agreement_id, approval_date FROM agreements ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_address LIKE '%Lane%';
SELECT party_name FROM parties WHERE party_type = 'Vendor';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_text, signing_date FROM contracts WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT agreement_text FROM agreements WHERE agreement_id < 10 AND client_id = 3;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties WHERE party_type = 'Company' ORDER BY party_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT title, client_id, created_at FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email, address FROM clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT section_id, section_title, content FROM sections ORDER BY section_id DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, template_id, created_at, last_updated FROM agreements WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM contracts ORDER BY created_at DESC, contract_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_id, title, client_id, created_at FROM contracts WHERE client_id = 3 OR client_id = 5 ORDER BY client_id ASC, created_at DESC;

SELECT c.title, a.client_id, a.created_at, t.title AS template_title FROM contracts c INNER JOIN agreements a ON c.contract_id = a.template_id INNER JOIN templates t ON a.template_id = t.template_id WHERE c.client_id = 2 ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY client_name ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT s.section_title, s.content, c.title AS contract_title, t.title AS template_title FROM sections s INNER JOIN contracts c ON s.contract_id = c.contract_id INNER JOIN agreements a ON s.contract_id = a.template_id INNER JOIN templates t ON a.template_id = t.template_id WHERE s.section_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY s.section_id ASC;
